name: Exemplar Companies
overview:
Exemplar is an innovative new economy professional services firm specializing in servicing the needs of fast growing companies in all phases of development from start-up through the mid market.

At Exemplar, our commitment is to serving our customers, not tracking our timesheets. We are the first law firm in the country to abandon hourly billing in favor of fixed, value-based pricing - and one of only a few firms that offer a service guarantee with the expressed goal of fostering open, long-term relationships. We strive to offer VIP treatment to every customer, and measure our success based on meeting or exceeding their expectations.

Our unique and diversified team crosses the disciplines of law, business and capital to better meet the needs of our customers. Our innovative, holistic approach ensures growth and success and greatly increases the competitive advantage of our customers. We work with the best and brightest business leaders of the day who are revolutionizing industries.

We have assembled an impressive, passionate and entrepreneurial team of business law and business sector experts to address the myriad of issues facing companies in todayâ€™s challenging business environment. Our team works closely with our customers to provide trusted advice, incomparable support, expert guidance and the ultimate competitive advantage as they accelerate their businesses and position themselves to transform the marketplace.
